comment.text: May act at junctions between the membrane and the cytoskeleton. Possesses tyrosine phosphatase activity.
Belongs to the protein-tyrosine phosphatase family. Non-receptor class subfamily.

property.value: Expressed in oocyte and 212 other tissues
P:negative regulation of epidermal growth factor receptor signaling pathway
P:negative regulation of membrane protein ectodomain proteolysis
P:negative regulation of mitotic cell cycle
P:regulation of membrane depolarization during action potential
P:regulation of sodium ion transmembrane transporter activity
